Question.Subject: can i transfer a domain name after it has been renewed?
Question.Content:
I know after you register a domain name you have to wait 60 days before you can transfer it, but what about transferring after it has been renewed?
I am trying to transfer my domain from a company I am unhappy with. I told them I wanted to transfer it and asked for them to unlock it and send me the auth code. Instead they just renewed the registration for another year. does this mean I have to wait 60 days before I can try to transfer it?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Transferring the Domain Name means not like that..You need not to continue the service or Don't like to continue means You can Moving to next Company that's all...In here http://www.goresellers.com/ You can Register Domain Name,Renewal the Domain Name and Transfer the Domain Name at cheap and Affordable cost.

Answer.Content: Transferring the Domain Name means not like that..You need not to continue the service or Don't like to continue means You can Moving to next Company that's all...In here http://www.goresellers.com/ You can Register Domain Name,Renewal the Domain Name and Transfer the Domain Name at cheap and Affordable cost.
